name: Mariusz Tang
role_explanation: As President, Mariusz oversees the operations of Parkour Club as a whole. He is the primary link between us and the Students' Union.
course: Computer Graphics, Vision and Imaging MSc

name: Ivan Ng
role_explanation: The Treasurer is responsible for the club's finances, and is the secondary link between us and the Union.
fun_fact: I took more than 90% of the parkour group selfies HAHAHAHA

name: Amy Ko
role_explanation: The Welfare Officer is your go-to person for any welfare concerns you may have regarding Parkour Club. Amy also oversees our participation in the TeamUCL Against Hate programme.
fun_fact: My hair colour was inspired by Monster (energy drink)

name: Sanjay Ashwin
role_explanation: The Training Officer is responsible for communicating with our coaches and organising sessions. You'll often see Sanjay leading members to our sessions from campus!
